    Jan 28, 2020

Distilling the Knowledge in a Neural Network, NIPS 2014 Deep Learning Workshop Zero-Shot Knowledge Distillation in Deep Networks, ICML 2019 기존 KD에 대한 여러 방법을 잘 알지...
